trends: There have been no other sightings in Creede
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Lights of 4colors spinning around object or strobing fast, objects hovered for long time
divs: Sighting DetailsLooked out window, seen bright strobing starlike object larger and brighter than other stars, hovered in place for at least 2 hours, still there while writing this report, def objects with various colors strobing or spinning very fast and one is much closer and much brighter very distinct, seen many other airplanes in sky at the time, very obvious distinction between the two, convinced its not helicopter or plane, one moved eventually away from us and out of clear sight other two still there at this moment, and extremely wired I feel like its definitely not any known aircraft and I've been around many types of aircraft, First one jumped in various directions really fast then left slowly other 2 are still here, still look like they are spinning, can't get them on camera, outside temp 8 deg f, dark, we live at 9000 feet elevation. Pretty weird.
